solution_line_template: Aliyah packs her lunch ½ the time, so in {total_school_days} school days / {aliyah_frequency_divisor} = she packs her lunch <<{total_school_days}/{aliyah_frequency_divisor}={aliyah_lunch_days}>>{aliyah_lunch_days} times.

Becky packs her lunch ½ as much as Aliyah, so {aliyah_lunch_days} times / {becky_frequency_divisor} = <<{aliyah_lunch_days}/{becky_frequency_divisor}={becky_lunch_days}>>{becky_lunch_days} times a year.
